short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collects tab groups and helps open them in a new window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you create groups of links and then open them in a window for later use. This is useful for focusing and organizing multiple sets of tab groups. 

Current features: 
- Add, delete, update groups
- Open groups in new window

Future features:
- Import existing tab groups into the extension
- Block all other websites except the ones you are focusing on.
